caption: A man is tied on the chair and a woman is saying something to him. The man is always refusing, and the woman is angry and plans to kill another woman, maybe his girlfriend. At that time, a new man arrives. The woman shoots at the man, but she fails. In the fight, that man is nearly killed, until he kicks something and use the arrow to kill the killer. The woman who is said to be killed is really afraid and cried. The next day, the two men go into a building while talking to each other, and they stop in front of a receptionist.

breakpoint.answer: A man is shot by an arrow.
